name: Empire
title: Utf8b8jsjq Memecoins Are Forever
text:
Synopsis
Binance remains the dominant crypto exchange by trading volume, maintaining its market leadership through strategic memecoin listings and aggressive market positioning despite regulatory challenges.

Key Insights
- Binance continues to lead crypto exchanges with $9 billion in daily normalized trading volume, significantly ahead of competitors Bybit ($3 billion) and Coinbase ($2.6 billion)
- Binance controls 44% of memecoin volume on centralized exchanges, demonstrating a strategic focus on emerging crypto market segments
- The exchange has listed 37 new tokens in 2024, including 9 memecoins and AI-related tokens, with up to 75x leverage on some perpetual contracts
- Binance has faced significant regulatory challenges across Europe, Asia, and Africa, including legal issues in multiple jurisdictions
- Over $2.1 billion has flowed out of Binance in the past month, with competing exchanges Bitget and Gate.io seeing inflows of $1.7 billion and $1.5 billion respectively
- New CEO Richard Teng maintains a stringent listing process, with approximately 600 total listed coins
